project_plan.name: Weather Information CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Set up project environment and dependencies
Implement API integration to fetch weather data
Parse the API response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement functionality to display weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the API integration and response parsing
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
